title: New Cassiopeia's Chroma pack looks awful
body:
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wuz44csggnA/VbgSOR3sjfI/AAAAAAAAue0/2aI2LGGigAU/s1600/cass3way.jpg
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Qf4r5tU54Fs/VbgSN3g_dQI/AAAAAAAAuec/f_CS4kZQ91w/s1600/cass1turn.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j-9lv-pKZjQ/VbgSN1TSN2I/AAAAAAAAueg/IMcmYmZDrwQ/s1600/cass2turn.jpg
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EZFZxZ00usw/VbgSNwIEuMI/AAAAAAAAuek/6D0-9W0KdvM/s1600/cass3turn.jpg

These look really revolting, I don't really get the colour selection, why does she have to look like she is dead or rotten like a zombie?. I was actually expecting a red one, the extra wait for the Chroma just to get this obviously not caring effort? Riot's been really hating on Cass lately..

replies.body: Yeah it's just downright ugly, no effort at all looked like it was put into this one. But on the other hand the Vayne and Nami ones look amazing, looks like Cassio is the one getting the short end of the stick this time sadly.
